import React from 'react' import "./CourseCard.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const CourseCard = ({item}) => { return (
{item.image && }
{item.level}

{item.title} ({item.course_type})

{item.description.slice(0,120) + "..."}

) } export default CourseCard
